MAIN_DESCRIPTION: Puedes mirar algunos de mis trabajos, y si te gustan, sientete libre en contactarme. Vamos a crear algo WOW!
ABOUT_DESCRIPTION_P1: Mi nombre es Jesús Díaz y soy un Desarrollador de Software.
ABOUT_DESCRIPTION_P2: Estoy habilitado para trabajar efectivamente en equipo o por mi cuenta. I have demonstrated an ability to lead small Teams and mentor other workers. I pride myself on being able to use my knowledge and initiative to deliver high quality results to tight deadlines. I enjoy a challenge and look for the opportunity to expand and develop my skill set.
ABOUT_DESCRIPTION_P3: Some people call what I do User Experience Design, some call it Web design, some think I am a Front-End Developer, others see me as a UI Designer. I see what I do as a combination of all these things and ultimately don’t think it really matters which label you like to use.
ABOUT_DESCRIPTION_P4: What does matter is the output of my work, which is always focused at the point where user, business and technical requirements meet and tends to become a perfect product.
SKILLS_SUBTITLE: I'm a truly dynamic individual with next-level ideas and a drive to succeed.
SKILLS_DESCRIPTION: I have a strong interest for anything Tech related! At a young age I was always fascinated with computers and how they allow people to discover such an incredible amount of information. I love meeting new people and creating connections. I'm a total geek at heart and nothing will ever change that!
